official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 93-233 to delay for one year the amendments made to the Social Security Act respecting teaching hospitals.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to extend for one year, until October 1, 1979, the period of time during which the services of physicians in teaching hospitals will be included as inpatient hospital services under that Title.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 93-233 to delay for one year the amendments made to the Social Security Act respecting teaching hospitals.
